name: Tyrin

projects.title: Semi-Autonomous Robot

projects.title: Dimension 3D
projects.description: A 3-dimensional strategy board game that tests your knowledge of geometry.

projects.title: Phone Charging Station Kiosk
projects.description: Touch operated kiosk where users can lock up their phones and charge them.

projects.title: Present Pastell
projects.description: A journaling web app that assigns your entries a color and custom playlist based off your mood.

services.title: MIT Sandbox
services.description: $1000 funding awarded to MIT students to pursue startups. Cick to learn more about my startup, Scrbe.

services.title: Third Place in 2.S007 Semi-Autonomous Robotics Competition
MIT Weblab Best Backend Feature Award
services.description: For my project, Present Pastell, an jounaling app that uses GPT to give your entries colors and generate a custom Spotify playlist based off your emotions. Click to learn more about the project.

services.title: HackMIT Hackathon Finalist
services.description: I was a 2021 HackMIT Hackathon finalist for my app that tracks police brutality. Click to see the full project

services.title: First Place in National Environmentors Science Fair ($2500 Scholarship)
services.description: I won this award in 2019 for my research on developing a low-cost internet connected particulate matter sensor network

services.title: Patrick Wang $1700 Grant For Engineering Project
services.description: This grant was awarded to me to develop a Phone Charging Station Kiosk. Click to learn more about the project

services.title: Hack Pennsylvania Hackathon Best Hardware Award
services.description: I won this award at Hack Pennsylvania for a fun little robot I made called The Office Bot. Click to learn more about the project.

aboutpara: Hi my name is Tyrin I am a junior at MIT majoring in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence. I love to take on projects that challenge me and allow me to learn new things or solve interesting problems. Feel free to reach out if one of my projects interets you. Below are some of my favorite projects but you can find more if you click "All Projects" at the top.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
